SELECT * FROM branch WHERE location = #{location} ORDER BY name

SELECT DISTINCT a.mid, b.id, b.rating, b.title, c.bid, d.location, d.name FROM movie_theater a JOIN movie b ON a.mid = b.id JOIN theater c ON a.tid = c.id JOIN branch d ON c.bid = d.id WHERE d.location = #{location} AND d.name = #{name}

SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.starttime, t.endtime, m.playdate, th.bid, th.name, s.tid, mt.mid, mt.enddate, (SELECT count(*) FROM seat s WHERE s.tid = t.id) as seat_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM seat s WHERE s.tid = t.id AND s.reserved = 'y' AND th.id = mt.tid) as seat_reserved FROM time t JOIN movie_theater mt ON t.mtid = mt.id JOIN movie m ON mt.mid = m.id JOIN theater th ON mt.tid = th.id JOIN branch b ON th.bid = b.id JOIN seat s ON s.tid = t.id WHERE b.location = #{location} AND b.name = #{name} AND m.rating = #{rating} AND m.title = #{title} AND TO_CHAR(t.moviedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{moviedate} ORDER BY id
